name: MRSAColonizationOrInfectionICD10CM
title: MRSA Colonization or Infection ICD10CM
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) infection.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a MRSA infection.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Diagnosis category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent MRSA infection.  Codes used are to be ICD10CM only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)

concept.display: Sepsis due to Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus
Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus infection, unspecified site
Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus infection as the cause of diseases classified elsewhere
Carrier or suspected carrier of Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus
Personal history of Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus infection
